body.name: CS KOCH SYSTEME Stone Earth Nonstick FryingPan, Nonstick Omelet Pan Skillet for All Stove Tops Include InductionCooker, Stir Fry Pan with HeatResistant Handle, APEO&PFOA-Free (Frying Pan, 11in-Pink)

features: 🌟[Superior Quality & Unique Appearance] Inner Aluminum alloy exterior wrapped with ceramic nonstick layer, white inner with designed black texture, exterior is a beautiful pink coating. This frying pan also comes with heat insulation handle. Its ergonomic curvature not only makes it comfortable to hold, but also thermally insulated.

🌟[Easy to Clean & Fast Clean up Mess] Easy to clean is also very important for a frying pan. This frying pan allows you to quickly clean after eating. The only thing you need is a soft sponge, then you can completely clean the frying pan by simply rinsing and wiping few times. Food or stains rarely stick to this frying pan

🌟[Non-stick Coating & Healthy Material] This stone earth frying pan is suppressed with five layers of materials. The surface white ceramic coating ensures non-stick characteristics of it. Four internal layers are made of aluminum alloy, allowing this frying pan to heat evenly and more resistant. All materials are 100% free of APEO and PFOA. You don't need to worry about material safety at any time.

🌟[All-match with Food and Four Stoves] If you own our 11 inch white & pink frying pan, then you will own multiple cooking experience. It is perfectly suitable for several stoves including induction stoves. You can also use it to cook a single egg, omelette, sausages, seafood, poultry, burgers or vegetables. So colorful culinary life for you. Just be careful not to put this frying pan into the oven.

🌟[Valuable Investment & After-sales Service] KOCH CS is committed to providing customers with professional after-sales service. We are confident that our frying pans are manufactured under strict quality standards to provide the best experience for our customers. Even if you encounter any product problems, we will provide you with intimate after-sales service whenever you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to Find the Right Frying Pan for Your Kitchen Avoid nonstick pans with textured cooking surface Some nonstick frying pans come with textured surfaces, such as the Frieling Black Cube Fry Pan and the Circulon Symmetry Hard-Anodized Nonstick French Skillet. It sounds a little like a no-brainer, but we found that the pans with textured surfaces were consistently less nonstick than pans with smooth surfaces — and the experts agree. “A raised pattern on a nonstick pan pretty much negates its nonstick ability,” Braun confirms. “Food tends to grip to the texture, so a smooth-bottomed pan is ideal in this category.” KOCH SYSTEME CS Nonstick Frying Pan is your best choice!

Nice marble texture Inside the pot is a nice white coating, dotted with black spots. This beautiful white marble coating can better highlight food and increase appetite when cooking. GLASS LID Tempered glass lids seal in heat and moisture Moreover, the glass lid helps to keep heat in the pan to fasten cooking while not losing the moisture at the same time. Black insulated handle Long ergonomic handles are designed to ensure the safety during use on the stovetop, while also promoting a firm, comfortable grip. Allows you to cook without being bothered by burns.

The beautiful pink outer layer, the unique white marble pot, and the appropriate depth allow you to not only have a good experience when using it, but also add visual enjoyment. With this pink frying pan, you have a variety of rich cuisines and also add a little vitality to the boring kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite pan! It does what it says it does!Easy to clean! Lightweight! Non stick!I have bought a lot of nonstick fry pands. This! actually! is what it says it is! It is easy to clean! Just a damp cloth wipe! and ready to use again!The color is a pink white but a little darker! The only fault! and it! is minor! I looked for a smaller pan in the same color! But! couldn’t find one!This pan is 11” they do have the smaller one in black! I was looking!for a set! All in all! I am very happy! with this purchase! I definitely! would recommend buying this pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great pan.
reviews.reviewText: I use this pan almost every day. It works great on an induction cooktop. I just let it cool after use and it cleans right up with nothing sticking. I'd buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best fry pan ever
reviews.reviewText: I love this pan. With my old pan my smoke alarm went off every time I used it. It hasn't happened with this pan yet. It's larger than my other pan and so easy to clean. And not expensive. Bravo to the manufacturer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT PINK!! NOT RED!
reviews.reviewText: IT JUST LOOKS LIKE THEY MIXED SOME LEFTOVER GREY PAINT WITH SOME RED PAINT AND CALLED IT PINK!! 🤣BUT I NEED THIS POT FOR A PROJECT THATS DUE SOON SO IM STILL DEBATING IF IMA SPRAY PAINT IT PINK OR JUST SEND IT BACK !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best egg pan I've ever owned!
reviews.reviewText: So many other pans claim to be non-stick. This one really is! Finally a pan where I can scramble my eggs and not have stuck on material left behind! Everything slid right off so easily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great frying pan
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best non-stick frying pans I've come across. It heats up very efficiently, so I used a lower flame than usual on my gas stove. Food cooks very evenly and the flavors stay with the food rather than ending up burned on the bottom of the pan. This pan is truly non-stick, making clean-up a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan and have purchased another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewText: Hasta ahora me ha gustado la forma de cocinar ,es realmente antihaderente,cocina uniforme ,no pierde la jugocidad lo que cocinas.Se limpia con un pañito o con pañito suave porque no pega nada .Lo he probado en este poco tiempo para cocinar pescados,pastel ,tortillas ,pan,etc en la hornilla de gas porque no tengo horno aparte que no es para usar en hornos . Lo ha hecho bastante bien.No le coloco las 5 estrellas porque ante todo lo sigo probando porque tengo pocos días con el, la tapa el revestimiento de la perilla no aguanta lo caliente se escarapela en primer día ,el sartén no se le quita color ahueado que agarro en la hornilla y aún cocinando a fuego lento truena el material del sartén . Lo seguiré probando para saber si compraré otro en el futuro .
I read both positive and negative reviews. Got to try it myself. It works! Non-stick. Bought another 10” deep pan awhile ago. Thanks Seller!
